ValidationRule.description: Requires not qualified notes to be made if not qualified is selected in lost reasons
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Qualification__c, "Qualified"), ISPICKVAL(Qualified_Level__c,"") )
,
AND( INCLUDES(Lost_Reasons__c, "Not Qualified"), ISPICKVAL( Not_Qualified_Level__c , "" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to complete the 'Not Qualified' section
